title: Dryad Soraka by Akizero

embed.description: "To heal and protect!" A short break from a lot of work lately (along with a lot of mangas, films and snacks /_\ ) One of the League of Legends suport champions that I like the most (pr...

body:
I think that the forums can use a bit more Soraka, so here is a neat fanart made by my friend Akizero (aka Zero1510). 
Who knew that Soraka had a thing for banana cupcakes? 
;)

replies.body:
That's really beautiful - your friend has skills and no mistake!  I don't understand the lighting, but I don't really mind :)

Also, now she's got me in the mood to make banana cupcakes.  Who wouldn't like cupcakes?
{{champion:51}}
what are you saying? she bakes them.
but she don't eat them

That is remarkable. Here, take my upvote.
http://img.pandawhale.com/173177-Zoidberg-dance-imgur-upvote-gi-Vz5b.gif

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BQAKRw6mToA

was playing in the background on my computer. too perfect.
I love this song!
Why 99% of fan art is manga? Don't get me wrong it's fantastic but..
Manga? What does this have to do with manga?
That's actually phenomenal.

> [{quoted}](name=Argronar,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=09LExIpI,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-28T16:20:02.921+0000)
>
> That's actually phenomenal.

Agreed!
Riot wishes they could hire an artist this good.

I am pretty sure my friend wouldn't mind getting a job offer from Riot.
*nudge nudge, wink wink*
;)
Really good and i mean really good.
Why is it always seem like fan art is better than Rito's artists?

That's beautiful!

Definitely my favorite Soraka skin - I use it all the time. I just wish she had light brown hair rather than green (there's enough earthy green going on already with the outfit).
If only Raka still had her early game as a support I'd still be playing her... le sigh
This is my favorite Soraka skin. :)
What a  picturesque piece.
This is incredible!
That looks great.
It's so pretteh! I love Soraka as is, and this is just lovely. As said before, I can't really pinpoint where the light is supposed to be coming from, but it looks beaut anywho~
Beautiful! I love it.
